Name: South Pacific Breeze
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
POUR first 2 ingredients into ice-filled glass.
TOP with lemonade to just below usual wash line.
DRIZZLE blue curaçao around top of cocktail (it will sink leaving strings of blue).
Review: Quite sweet but flavoursome - looks great.
Nutrition: One serving of South Pacific Breeze contains 212 calories
